Segment.name: G70
Segment.comment: To provide for miscellaneous information relative to a line item

Field.name: Pack
Field.comment: The number of inner containers, or number of eaches if there are no inner containers, per outer container

Field.name: Size
Field.comment: Size of supplier units in pack

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: PurchaseOrderInstructionCode
Field.comment: Code defining the disposition of any difference between the quantity ordered and the quantity available for shipment

Field.name: PriceReasonCode
Field.comment: Code identifying reason for differences in price or coupons redeemed

Field.name: TermsExceptionCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of terms exception

Field.name: TaxExemptCode
Field.comment: Code identifying exemption status from sales and use tax

Field.name: PalletBlockAndTiers
Field.comment: Code indicating pallet and load structure; first three digits indicate the number of cases per layer, last three digits indicate the number of layers per pallet

Field.name: InnerPack
Field.comment: The number of eaches per inner container

SyntaxNote.name: P0203
SyntaxNote.comment: If either G7002 or G7003 is present, then the other is required.
